keyFacts: The invoice is dated August 11, 2003, and is addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein.
Total charges for the invoice amount to $234.94.
Multiple shipments were made by Epstein, with various recipients including Karen L. Fordom and Dale Al Jame.
The document includes details of shipping charges, discounts, and customs entries.
Several packages were picked up and delivered on specific dates in July and August 2003.
